content.text:
# 2015 Origins Award winners

The following are the winners of the 42nd annual (2015) Origins Award, presented at Origins 2016:
{| class="wikitable"
! Category
! Winner
! Company
! Designer(s)
|-
| Game of the Year
| Codenames
| Czech Games Edition
| Vlaada Chvátil
|-
|Best Board Game
| Star Wars: Imperial Assault
| Fantasy Flight Games
| Justin Kemppainen, Corey Konieczka, Jonathan Ying
|-
|Best Card Game
|7 Wonders Duel
| Repos Productions
| Antoine Bauza, Bruno Cathala
|-
|Best Family Game
| Codenames
| Czech Games Edition
| Vlaada Chvátil
|-
|Best Miniatures Game
| Star Wars: Armada
| Fantasy Flight Games
|James Kniffen, Christian T. Petersen
|-
|Best Collectible Game
| DC Comics Dice Masters: War of Light
| WizKids
| Mike Elliott, Eric M. Lang
|-
|Best Role-Playing  Game
| Star Wars: Force and Destiny
| Fantasy Flight Games
|Jay Little
|-
|Best Game Accessory
| Terrain Tiles
| Lost Battalion Games
|Becky Siebe
|-
|}
